INNER TREE

Graduation Project - July 2019

“Inner Tree” is a VR experience that allows the viewer to explore the different stages of the process of enlightenment. Each person will experience it in a slightly different way. Hopefully, allowing the viewer to reflect on the importance of introspective, spiritual practices, rather than focusing solely on an external search for answers.

Skills

Directing, VR, Art, Coding


Tools

Unity, Blender, Adobe Audition

Inner Tree Trailer

Research


The project has required intensive research through Kabbalistic and Hermetic principles as well as research into Tibetan meditation, Buddhism, Masonic Initiation. These was combined with research about Virtual Reality and technology to come up with a philosophical framework that was worthy of exploring as an artistic piece.

Research


The project has required intensive research through Kabbalistic and Hermetic principles as well as research into Tibetan meditation, Buddhism, Masonic Initiation. These was combined with research about Virtual Reality and technology to come up with a philosophical framework that was worthy of exploring as an artistic piece.

Project Layout


For the layout of the project, it was decided to divide the project into four chapters, each explaining a Sephiroth from the Qabalistic “Tree of Life”. Each chapter needs to have its own cohisive visual style and a unique script that has a philosophical structure that ties the whole project together.

World Design


For the World Design, I created a basic layout about how each chapter will look like, what their main philosophical concept is going to be about and how they relate to the Cabalistic Tree of Life. Creating an infographic if how each stage of the VR experience is going to feel to the user.
During the whole experience, the player will be hearing a voice that guides him/her. In this infographic it was also displayed some of the script and quotes that the voice is going to explore.

MALKUTH:


This chapter referes to the Earth and Nature.The viewer will be brought to a really calming environment surrounded by trees and water. There will be Voice Over in different languages explaining the concept of the project.

MALKUTH:


This chapter referes to the Earth and Nature.The viewer will be brought to a really calming environment surrounded by trees and water. There will be Voice Over in different languages explaining the concept of the project.

TYPHARET:


This chapter is all about beauty and the sun.The previous landscape will be decomposed into a more surreal landscape in order to represent the transition between different states of the inner landscape.

DA’ATH:


This chapter represents the Abyss and the loss of the Ego and the Self into the collective consciousness.Only darkness will be showed, with small particles of light. Here an event will happend that represents the surrender of the Ego and which will allow the viewer into the last Chapter.

DA’ATH:


This chapter represents the Abyss and the loss of the Ego and the Self into the collective consciousness.Only darkness will be showed, with small particles of light. Here an event will happend that represents the surrender of the Ego and which will allow the viewer into the last Chapter.

KETHER:


This is the last chapter of the VR experience and it represents The Godhead.Here everything will be represented as an empty bluish space, where the Voice will explain the concepts of interconnection in the Universe.
